project_id.description: The unique identifier of the project to which the label belongs.

id.description: The unique identifier for the label within the project.

name.description: The name or title of the label for easy identification.

color.description: The color code representation of the label for visual identification.

description.description: The textual description of the label indicating its purpose or meaning.

description_html.description: The HTML formatted description of the label for display purposes.

text_color.description: The color code representation for the text color of the label for contrast.

subscribed.description: A flag indicating whether the user is subscribed to notifications for this label.

priority.description: The priority level assigned to the label, if applicable.

is_project_label.description: A flag indicating whether the label is specifically created for the project.

open_issues_count.description: The total count of open issues associated with this label.

closed_issues_count.description: The total count of closed issues associated with this label.

open_merge_requests_count.description: The total count of open merge requests associated with this label.
